articles.title: Why India's most underrated businesses deserve their Baahubali moment
articles.author: Nagessh Pannaswami
articles.summary: Curry Nation and Nagessh Pannaswami introduced the book 'From Commodity to Brand,' a playbook designed to help owner-managed businesses in India transform into memorable brands. This book unveils the UNLIMIT Model and outlines five practical steps for businesses transitioning from product-thinking to brand-thinking, providing insights and case studies to shift from commodity status to building a brand that commands preference.

articles.title: Finally, A Practical Electric Pickup Truck
articles.author: Wes Siler
articles.summary: Toyota has unveiled the new, ninth-generation Toyota Hilux, including a Battery Electric Vehicle (BEV) version. This BEV Hilux is aimed at commercial fleets and offers a practical alternative to high-powered electric pickups, with potential applications in mining, urban businesses, and government operations. It is set to be available in multiple versions, including gas, diesel, and hybrid powertrains.

articles.title: Reddit Introduces Interactive Ads To Enable Custom In-Feed Brand Experiences
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: Reddit has launched Interactive Ads, a new advertising format in limited alpha testing. This ad unit allows brands to create interactive experiences within Reddit's feed, including quizzes, countdowns, and dynamic reveals. Early testers include Paramount Pictures and Electronic Arts.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2互換性情報ページ、検索機能で探しやすく
articles.summary: Nintendo is working on Nintendo Switch 2. The 'Switch 2' succeeds the Nintendo Switch.

articles.title: The Startup Turning Tab Overload Into Creative 'Taste At Speed'
articles.author: Ron Schmelzer
articles.summary: First Concepts is launching an AI-native workspace that helps creative teams go from brief to pitch-ready concepts up to 70% faster while maintaining creative quality. This startup's system sits on top of the existing tool stack, unifying teams, briefs, relevant inspiration and research, then orchestrating it around GenAI tools.

articles.title: Oatly CEO Admits \u2018Climate Doom\u2019 Marketing Has Backfired as Sales Plummet
articles.author: Principia Scientific
articles.summary: Oatly, a Swedish oat-milk company, faces challenges with consumer perception regarding sustainability despite being once considered ethical.

articles.title: Carbon Analysis: ‘Wizz Class' Will Make Wizz Air Less Efficient
articles.author: William Moore
articles.summary: Wizz Air is launching a new premium product called 'Wizz Class'. The 'Wizz Class' will be trialed in December and includes an extra legroom seat and an empty adjacent seat.

articles.title: Red Lobster Launches Fresh Seafood Boils and Seasonal Delights
articles.summary: Red Lobster launched fresh seafood boils, embracing a popular trend after rebounding from bankruptcy. Initially introduced in June 2025, the boils became a permanent menu item in September. The company has recently added three new flavors to the seafood boil offerings.

articles.title: Maxi is now selling cellphone plans in Quebec… for about the price of a case of beer
articles.author: Alexander Sciola
articles.summary: The grocery brand no name, in partnership with Bell, launched no name mobile, a prepaid mobile phone service, in Quebec at Maxi stores. This service offers low-cost plans starting at $19 a month with unlimited calling across Canada and to the U.S. and aims to provide a more accessible and cheaper phone service to Quebecers.

articles.title: 'Mamma mia': Italy food lovers in shock over carbonara in a can
articles.author: Jonny Walfisz
articles.summary: Heinz, a US manufacturer, has launched a new product: Heinz spaghetti carbonara in a can, priced at £2. The company describes it as a 'pasta in a creamy sauce with pancetta' and a 'perfect solution for a quick and satisfying meal at home.' According to the Heinz website, the new product is already sold out.

articles.title: Lemon Pepper Butter, anyone? Red Lobster drops new seafood boil flavors
articles.author: Haniyah Philogene
articles.summary: Red Lobster has introduced new menu items, including Lemon Pepper Butter, Old Bay & Butter, and RL Signature Butter flavors to its seafood boil series. Two new entrees, Shrimp & Sausage Jambalaya and Shrimp Scampi Linguini, are also being introduced. The chain is also serving Under the Mistletoe, Sugar Cookie Delight, and Snow Globe Sangria as new cocktails.

articles.title: AgVault Advanced Yeast Proves Superior to Current Alternatives
articles.author: Ag Vault
articles.summary: AgVault is launching its novel precision fermentation technology. This technology will be used to produce a yeast product. The yeast product will surpass existing standard yeast options on a whole-cell basis.

articles.title: An A.I. Machine That Passes the Smell Test
articles.author: Jane Margolies
articles.summary: ScenTronix launched an updated Algorithmic Perfumery machine at a beauty trade conference in Dubai. The new machine features 300 glass dispensers and allows customers to directly communicate their desired scent profiles to the device.

articles.title: GOJO Unveils Its Latest Breakthrough in Hand Hygiene Technology
articles.author: GOJO Industries
articles.summary: GOJO Industries introduced the PURELL® CX10 Countermount Dispensing System at the 2025 ISSA North America Trade Show. The CX10 features touch-free operation, flexible under-counter installation, and smart-system capabilities. It reflects GOJO's commitment to hand hygiene technology and sustainable solutions.

articles.title: This If-You-Know-You-Know Bodycare Brand Is Stocked in Every Beauty Editor's Shower
articles.author: Julia Marzovilla
articles.summary: Cyklar, a body care brand, expanded its product line to include perfume oils, body oils, and in-shower body balms. The newly launched scents include Core Vetiver, along with existing scents like Sacred Santal and Cedar Supreme, offering various options for consumers. One of the product is in-shower body balm which is intended for application on wet skin, providing softness, smoothness, and hydration.

articles.title: Sleep Collection from Blueair tested: Strong duo, simple look
articles.summary: Blueair has launched its 'Sleep Collection', which includes the Mini Restful air purifier and the DreamWell humidifier. The Mini Restful features a HEPA filter and sunrise simulation, while the DreamWell humidifier uses ultrasonic technology and aromatherapy. Both devices can be controlled via the Blueair app and are available for purchase.

articles.title: Brooks officially launches new Adrenaline GTS 25 running shoe
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Brooks has launched the Adrenaline GTS 25 running shoes, the latest upgrade to their popular stability model. This release offers more nitrogen-infused cushioning and a sleek design for maximum comfort.

articles.title: One small step for man: Oppo's Find X9 Pro shoots for the moon
articles.author: John Davidson
articles.summary: Hasselblad has introduced a new telephoto lens that mounts onto Oppo's upcoming Find X9 Pro phone. This lens aims to enhance the phone's camera capabilities.

articles.title: London-based laundry service expands to 13 cities across Canada
articles.author: Ryan Goodison
articles.summary: 1StopLaundry, a pick-up and delivery laundry service, started with one customer in London and has expanded to 13 cities. To manage increasing orders, the company implemented custom software that automatically sends orders to partnered laundromats and assigns them to drivers or Uber partners.

articles.title: Vancouver Agency Rebrands as Genius Marketing Co., Expanding Regional Marketing Reach
articles.author: pressadvantage
articles.summary: Genius Marketing Co., formerly Plant Powered Marketing, rebranded to align with its national sister company, Spray Foam Genius Marketing. This change reflects the agency's expansion to a full-service marketing partner for local and regional service-based companies. The rebranding integrates local expertise with nationally built systems to help local businesses achieve measurable results through data-backed marketing.

articles.title: Where Tradition Meets Tomorrow – A New Milk Is Born; Remilk and Gad Dairies Launch 'The New Milk'
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Remilk and Gad Dairies have launched 'The New Milk,' a dairy product made without cows, in Israel. This product, promising authentic taste and nutritional value, is currently available in cafes and restaurants and will be available in major retail chains in January 2026. Further product releases are planned in the coming months.

articles.title: BuzzBallz Decks the Walls with Ballz in Limited-Edition Holiday Décor Drop
articles.author: Sazerac
articles.summary: BuzzBallz is launching a limited-edition holiday shelf called "Ballz on the Wallz" that chills ready-to-drink cocktails and lights up your space. The company is also introducing a new holiday flavor, Elf Maple Syrup Sundae.

articles.title: I'm a lifestyle editor, and these are the John Lewis beauty deals I'll be snapping up this Black Friday
articles.author: SOPHIE HINES
articles.summary: Several beauty and personal care products are being highlighted as part of Black Friday promotions. Dyson's Supersonic Origin Hair Dryer, Charlotte Tilbury's Magic Cream and Hollywood Flawless Filter, Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm and Estée Lauder Advanced Night Repair Serum are among the items featured with discounts at retailers like John Lewis. Other products such as Hourglass Voyeur Waterproof Gel Eyeliner, IT Cosmetics brushes, Cowshed Hand Wash, Caudalie Face Mist, Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Bum Bum Cream and Charlotte Tilbury Charlotte's Mini Viral Beauty Icons Christmas Makeup Gift Set are also mentioned.

articles.title: Instacart is betting on AI shopping carts that suggest what you should buy as you shop
articles.author: Alex Bitter
articles.summary: Instacart is launching 'Cart Assistant,' an AI agent integrated into Caper smart shopping carts and retailer websites. This AI tool assists shoppers with purchasing decisions, manages budgets, checks for specific ingredients, and provides shopping suggestions. Sprouts Farmers Market plans to implement this technology in their stores.

articles.title: From booth to boom: How smart founders master trade shows in 2 seconds or less
articles.author: Marianne Hayes
articles.summary: Various companies like Anne Klein and Bobo Choses attended the NY NOW tradeshow to showcase their latest wholesale products and innovative designs.  These brands engaged with retailers, offering solutions and collections, thus enabling partnerships and expanding product reach. Shopify highlighted the importance of retailers being able to source products that resonate with their brand.

articles.title: Copper & Kings Launches New Core Portfolio, Ushering in a Bold New Era for American Brandy
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Copper & Kings American Brandy Company has unveiled its new flagship portfolio consisting of three spirits. This launch aims to redefine the American brandy category.

articles.title: New Balance Just Dropped the Perfect Autumn Sneakers. Here's Where To Buy Them
articles.author: Johnny Davis
articles.summary: New Balance is launching the 997 sneaker in 'Dried Apricot and Calcium' colorways. This new release, priced at £210, will be available from Thursday, 13 November. This version is a part of the 'Made in USA' series, exploring earth tones and neutrals.

articles.title: Dakar 2026: Games Fest Marks 1 Year Out!
articles.author: Luis Mendoza
articles.summary: The International Olympic Committee (IOC)'s mascot 'Ayo' for the Dakar 2026 Youth Olympic Games sparked controversy due to heavy AI reliance, despite being based on children's designs, raising questions about authenticity and AI's role in creative processes. AI algorithms are being introduced to optimize ad campaigns, personalize training regimens, and enhance fan experiences through tailored content, offers, and experiences.

articles.title: QIAGEN Unveils QIAsymphony Connect and Showcases New Precision Oncology Innovations at AMP 2025
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: QIAGEN N.V. launched QIAsymphony Connect. This announcement was made public today.

articles.title: The Best Pressure Washers On Amazon To Blast Away Grime
articles.author: Lourdes Avila Uribe
articles.summary: The article reviews several new power washers from brands like Westinghouse, Sun Joe, Greenworks, Kärcher, and Craftsman. These washers feature various specifications, including different PSI levels, electric or gas-powered options, nozzle types, and hose lengths, catering to diverse cleaning needs and price points. Prices range from $63.36 to $349.

articles.title: LiberNovo Launches Black Friday Savings: Redefine Your Workspace for Health
articles.author: Liber Novo
articles.summary: LiberNovo launched its Black Friday & Cyber Monday sale across the U.S. and Canada on November 10, 2025. The sale includes limited-time discounts of up to 34% on the LiberNovo Omni, an ergonomic office chair with a footrest.

articles.title: Bountii Canada Ignites a New Era of Online Savings with Its Innovative Coupon Platform
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Bountii Canada launched a new coupon platform designed for Canadian shoppers. The platform aims to provide a cleaner and faster way to save money online by offering only real, working deals, eliminating expired codes and clutter.

articles.title: A1 Minute November 10, 2025: Charlottesville City Market launches 'Harvest Special' to help SNAP customers
articles.summary: Charlottesville City Market launched 'Harvest Special'. The special helps SNAP customers.

articles.title: Bountii Canada Ignites a New Era of Online Savings with Its Innovative Coupon Platform
articles.summary: Bountii Canada has launched its innovative coupon platform designed to provide Canadians with a cleaner and faster way to save money online. The platform offers verified deals, relevant retailers that ship within Canada, accept CAD, and provides region-appropriate customer support and transparent listings, aiming to simplify the online savings experience.

articles.title: Syndacast Launches AI-Powered Video Solution to Transform Hotel Marketing in Asia Pacific
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Syndacast launched AI-Powered Video Content for Advertising. The service transforms hotel photo libraries into engaging videos. It aims to drive bookings and brand visibility.

articles.title: Don't wait for Black Friday — Shop these early deals now
articles.author: The Curator Team
articles.summary: Amazon Canada's Early Black Friday Sale features deals on various products. Dyson Supersonic Origin hair dryer with intelligent heat control is available for $399.99. Oral-B iO6 Electric Toothbrush provides a deep clean for $149.99. Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K Select allows streaming in 4K Ultra HD for $34.99 and LG 65-Inch B4 OLED 4K Smart TV provides stunning colour and contrast for $1399.99.

articles.title: Exact date Lidl's amazing beauty dupes land in store including marine cream that's £93 cheaper than the real thing
articles.summary: Lidl is launching its new Deluxe Beauty collection, featuring products like the Deluxe Twilight Cloud Cream, Deluxe Pro Collagen Cleansing Balm, and a range of toners (Niacinamide, Hyaluronic, and Retinol). The products will be available in stores from November 13, offering skincare at budget-friendly prices.

articles.title: Banzai Acquires AI Web Development and Hosting Platform Superblocks (Banzai International Inc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Banzai International, Inc. has introduced Superblocks, an AI Agent designed for website and landing page creation and hosting, into its expanding product suite. Banzai believes Superblocks will be a powerful new AI tool for its customers, providing a faster and easier experience.

articles.title: New Taipei revives old shops with NT$100,000 boost
org: New Taipei City Government Youth Department
articles.summary: New Taipei City has relaunched a revitalization program offering expert guidance and subsidies to businesses for modern makeovers. Several businesses, including Bear's Breakfast, Gin Yi Chinese Medicine, and Washwise, were revamped in a first round, resulting in redesigned spaces, rebranding, and increased sales. Bear's Breakfast focused its rebranding on a fresh look that mixes old local stories with a younger image.

articles.title: Cult-favorite vape brand celebrates 10 years with its best device yet
articles.author: Rachelle Gordon
articles.summary: DynaVap has launched the VonG X, its most advanced battery-free dry herb vaporizer, to celebrate its 10th anniversary. The VonG X features updated mouthpiece and condenser that offer total airflow customization, a redesigned structure delivers faster heat-up and cooldown times, and an extra-large tip for more flower. The VonG X starts at $129.

articles.title: How AI Is Accelerating The Recurring Revenue Economy
articles.author: Thomas Ryd
articles.summary: Companies like Ring and Tesla are transforming their products into platforms for ongoing services by using AI and software updates. Ring unlocks real-time notifications and video retrieval through subscriptions, while Tesla offers self-driving mode for a monthly fee. This approach allows companies to generate predictable revenue streams and deepen customer relationships beyond the initial purchase.

articles.title: SearchStax Introduces Multi-Site Search Management to Unify Governance and Empower Marketing Agility
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: SearchStax, Inc. has introduced new multi-site management capabilities for its Site Search solution. This advancement enhances how organizations manage, improve, and assess search experiences within extensive digital networks.

articles.title: Revlon Launches Super Lustrous Ultra™ Lipstick Exclusively at Ulta Beauty
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Revlon is launching Super Lustrous Ultra™, a new lip product combining lipstick color with lip balm nourishment. The product will be available at Ulta Beauty for beauty enthusiasts.

articles.title: 'I ate at Greggs' first ever pub and was astonished when I ordered sausage roll'
articles.author: Michael Moran
articles.summary: Greggs has launched a new pub called "The Golden Flake" inside a Fenwicks store in Newcastle. The pub's menu is inspired by Greggs' popular items and features creatively presented versions of their classic offerings, such as a sausage roll served with mash and artisan sage garnish, costing £9.

articles.title: Zayo Puts High-Capacity Network Muscle Behind Mexico, U.S. Manufacturing Corridor
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Zayo launched its first Zayo-owned Point of Presence (PoP) in Monterrey, Mexico. This 400G PoP expands Zayo's high-capacity North American network, enhancing connectivity for businesses adopting AI and cloud technologies.

articles.title: Revlon Launches Super Lustrous Ultra™ Lipstick Exclusively at Ulta Beauty
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Revlon has launched its new 'Super Lustrous Ultra™ Lipstick', a premium addition to its Super Lustrous franchise. Available exclusively at Ulta Beauty, the lipstick features a hydrating formula with skincare ingredients, high-impact pigments, smudge resistance, and luxe packaging. The product is priced at $15.99 and is available online and will launch at select locations on January 18, 2026.

articles.title: 29 Products To Keep You Warm And Cozy
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: The article showcases a collection of winter products designed for warmth and comfort. These include items like a Carhartt beanie, heated blankets, space heaters, apparel such as fleece-lined jeggings and insulated snow pants, and accessories such as heated massage cushions and touchscreen-friendly gloves. The highlighted products focus on providing solutions to combat the cold weather and enhance the user's experience during the winter season.

articles.title: PunchDrunk Digital Wins Netty Award for Best Use of Advertising Analytics
articles.summary: PunchDrunk Digital's proprietary data engine, GUS, has won the 2025 Netty Award for Best Use of Advertising Analytics. GUS blends audience analytics, behavioral insights, and campaign intelligence to help brands connect with real people. The platform is intended to guide smarter creative, targeting, and spend decisions.

articles.title: Vessi co-founder teases new Vancouver footwear launch
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Vessi, a Canadian waterproof footwear brand, developed Dyma-tex, a unique waterproof knit material. The company is launching a new footwear style called 'The Motu,' which blends urban and outdoor features, offering increased traction and durability while maintaining a stylish design.

articles.title: I made my Windows desktop useful again with this free widget app
articles.author: Yasir Mahmood
articles.summary: Widget Launcher, a free app, introduces the capability to place individual widgets directly on the Windows desktop. It offers various customizable widgets like calendar, weather, clock, CPU meter, notes, and calculator. The app aims to make the desktop more functional by providing at-a-glance information.

articles.title: Native Advertising Techniques
articles.author: Blaine Howerton
articles.summary: North Forty News could partner with Passanante's Home Food Service to publish an article. The article subtly mentions Passanante's Home Food Service delivers restaurant-quality ingredients to your doorstep.

articles.title: Bakery chain Greggs opens new 'Bitesize' shops to bring treats to more customers
articles.summary: The Newcastle festive bake maker has launched a new shop format. The company hopes to roll out this format across the UK.

articles.title: Boost Authorized Retailers chose to partner with Liberty
articles.author: Criticologos
articles.summary: Liberty is offering special benefits to Boost Mobile customers who switch to their services, including a free first month and discounts on device purchases. Liberty also launched a sweepstakes to incentivize customers to port their numbers. The company plans to expand prepaid product and service offerings for new locations in 2026.

articles.title: Primo Brands Announces Increase to Share Repurchase Program Authorization
articles.author: Morning Times
articles.summary: Legacy Acquisition Corp. has rebranded as Primo Brands Corporation (NYSE: PBHC) following the completion of its business combination with HSM Equity Partners.

articles.title: Representing Bharat's Brainpower, Appinventiv Takes Indian AI Prowess to 70+ Countries
articles.author: Initiative Desk
articles.summary: Appinventiv is recognized for its AI product engineering and digital transformation capabilities. The company developed AI solutions, including a data and analytics suite that increased conversion rates and orders for a global QSR brand and an AI-powered portal for a HR platform, resulting in streamlined profiling, quick matching for blue-collar workers and $52 million in Series B funding.

articles.title: The tablet that quickly replaced my iPad and Kindle now has a worthy successor
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: TCL has introduced the Nxtpaper 11 Plus, an Android tablet. The tablet offers reliable daily performance at an affordable price.

articles.title: EarthFresh Launches Butter Potatoes Nationwide, Bringing Premium Taste to Kitchens Across America
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: EarthFresh is relaunching its "Butter Potatoes" with a bold new look and expanded availability, setting a new standard for flavor and quality. This relaunch aims to bring freshness and innovation to the produce aisle.

articles.title: 31 Must-Have Products You Won't Stop Thinking About
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: L'Oréal Paris is introducing a green-tinted anti-redness BB cream designed to neutralize redness while priming and hydrating skin. Windex offers an outdoor glass cleaner that attaches to a hose for easy window cleaning without a ladder. Additionally, several other new products are mentioned: a WD-40 pen for precise lubrication, a neutralizing lip gloss, and aligner removal tools to simplify dental aligner removal.

articles.title: Bitchin' Sauce Exploring Collabs
articles.author: Madison Geering
articles.summary: Bitchin' Sauce and Yellowbird Foods launched a limited-edition Serrano and Habanero Bitchin' Sauce in October, marking Bitchin's first product collaboration. Furthermore, Bitchin' is also launching other collaborations, like a veggie tray with Taylor Farms, and planning expansion into non-nut dips and salsas.

articles.title: Perfect Corp. Launches YouCam AI Beauty Agent in YouCam Makeup App to Lead the Next Generation of Conversational AI in Beauty, Skincare and Fashion
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Perfect Corp. has launched YouCam AI Beauty Agent, a conversational AI agent suite for beauty, skincare, and fashion available within the YouCam Makeup app. This agent provides features like personal color analysis, makeup and hair recommendations, and virtual try-ons, aiming to offer a personalized and immersive beauty experience.

articles.title: Scouted: Murad's New Lipid-Enriched Cleansing Balm Delivers a Double Cleanse in One Step
articles.author: Mia Maguire
articles.summary: Murad launched Lipid-Enriched Double Cleansing Balm, a single-step product designed to provide a deep cleanse while hydrating skin. The balm removes makeup and impurities without causing dryness, and it comes in a twist-up grinder for easy and mess-free application.

articles.title: Top Casino Software Providers in the Philippines 2025
articles.author: Jay Pabs
articles.summary: Pragmatic Play is known for high-quality graphics and frequent bonuses with games like Sweet Bonanza and Gates of Olympus, while JILI Games specializes in Asian-style slots with strong mobile support, featuring games like Super Ace and Golden Empire. Evolution Gaming provides a leading live dealer experience, enhancing the online casino market in the Philippines.

articles.title: Ziggo adds AI to voice search on Next boxes
articles.author: Julian Clover
articles.summary: Ziggo is launching an AI-powered voice control upgrade for its Next and Next Mini platforms on November 14th. This enhancement allows users to search for content using natural language, covering genres, actors, and themes, and extends voice control to core TV functions. The feature will be automatically enabled for all Next and Next Mini customers with a voice remote.

articles.title: Amman Chamber Launches Import, Export Analytical Service to Support Traders
articles.author: Ammon
articles.summary: The Amman Chamber of Commerce has launched a new service called 'Import and Export Analytical Sheets.' This service is designed to provide analytical data related to import and export activities.

articles.title: Chinese brands are sweeping the world. Good
articles.author: Economist
articles.summary: Chinese consumer brands are expanding globally. Mixue, Meituan, Chagee, and Pop Mart are examples of companies gaining traction. Chagee went public in New York to support its international growth, demonstrating the increasing presence of Chinese brands in the global market.

articles.title: I've tested Otty's original hybrid mattress – can it beat pricier rivals?
articles.author: Eleanor Jones
articles.summary: Otty has launched the Otty original hybrid mattress, priced from £499.99. The mattress combines memory foam and springs for comfort and support and comes conveniently packaged in a box. It aims to provide an affordable and comfortable sleep solution.

articles.title: Tesla China rolls out Model Y L V2L adapter, and it's free for early owners
articles.summary: Tesla introduced the V2L (Vehicle-to-Load) adapter for the Model Y in China. This new product enhances the versatility of electric vehicles by enabling them to power external devices.

articles.title: The LYCRA Company Announces Grand Opening of Its Largest Global Spandex Production Facility in China
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: The LYCRA Company has officially opened its LYCRA® fiber (Yinchuan) Plant, its largest spandex production facility, in Ningxia Province, China. This new facility represents an investment of over RMB 800 million and aims to produce 30,000 tons of spandex initially, with plans to expand to 120,000 tons annually to meet the growing demand for spandex.

articles.title: Chicklet Gold
articles.author: Norman Winter
articles.summary: In 2024, Chicklet Gold Esperanza debuts as a new plant for landscapes. Chicklet Red is also expected to be introduced later in 2026. The Esperanza plant is heat-tolerant and suitable for various planting locations.

articles.title: These $10 Amazon Socks Look And Feel Like A Splurge-y Boutique Purchase
articles.author: Lourdes Avila Uribe
articles.summary: Amazon offers crew socks in packs of two, three, and five for under $20. These mid-weight socks are made with breathable, moisture-wicking bamboo-blend fabric and are available in multi-colored packs fitting women's sizes 5-10.

articles.title: KATHERINE SPENLEY's best anti-ageing lipstick balms
articles.author: Katherine Spenley
articles.summary: Korres offers a multi balm known for skincare, available as a chunky stick with a dome of color for cheeks and lips. M&S sells a balm with hyaluronic acid, shea butter and avocado oil. Hourglass offers a slim tube balm that acts like lipstick, providing coverage while warding off chapped lips.

articles.title: 49 Clever Home Products You'll Want To Add To Your Cart
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article introduces a range of new products, including a WD-40 pen for targeted application, a Doap bar for removing dough, a KitchenAid nonstick cookie slider sheet, a refillable candle kit, and a Dash ice cream-making mug. These products aim to offer solutions to everyday problems, enhancing convenience and efficiency in various tasks around the house.

articles.title: Revolutionizing Clarity and Comfort: Introducing New Ultra-Clear Tempered Glass with Double-Sided AG Coating
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: The product delivers exceptional light transmittance and minimal color distortion, guaranteeing true-to-life visuals for displays, touchscreens, and protective covers. Its double-sided AG treatment diffuses ambient light.

articles.title: I've slept on the Simba Hybrid Pro for four years – here's why it's our Best Buy
articles.author: Hannah Mendelsohn
articles.summary: Simba has updated the Simba Hybrid Pro mattress with a new cool-touch cover and the ability to unzip and wash the top half.  The Hybrid Pro features nearly 5,000 pocket springs, multiple layers for temperature regulation and support, and is delivered in a box with an option to recycle old mattresses for an extra fee.

articles.title: Tesla can't sell its cars anymore so it is renting them now
articles.author: Fred Lambert
articles.summary: Tesla is launching a new car rental program in the US, available at select stores with rentals ranging from three to seven days, starting at $60 per day. The rental includes free Supercharging and Full Self-Driving (Supervised), and customers who purchase a Tesla within a week of renting receive a $250 credit.

articles.title: Is ChatGPT Plus still worth $20? How it compares to the Free and Pro plans
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: ChatGPT offers consumer plans beyond its free version. These plans involve subscription models providing users with enhanced service offerings from OpenAI.

articles.title: Wolt set to expand to e-commerce: A new generation of shopping
articles.author: LEO FEIERBERG BETTER
articles.summary: Wolt introduced a new design for its app reflecting the company's vision. The updated app includes several new features, signifying an update or launch of new services.

articles.title: 30 "Boring" Things That'll Give Your Home A Refresh
articles.author: Chelsea Stuart
articles.summary: Bissell offers a Little Green upholstery cleaner and a SteamShot for various cleaning needs. Conair provides a fabric defuzzer for removing pills and matted fibers. NoNo Brackets introduces curtain rod brackets that attach to existing blinds for easy installation.

articles.title: Next's €84 winter coat in five colours 'looks way more expensive than it is'
articles.summary: Next is offering the 'Shower Resistant Padded Hooded Coat' for €84, available in multiple colors and sizes. The coat has received positive feedback, with customers praising its warmth, quality, and shower resistance. Similar products are also available at M&S and ASOS.

articles.title: The stars have arrived as NuStar Online ushers in a new era of digital luxury
articles.summary: NuStar Online officially unveiled its premier luxury digital entertainment platform on November 7. The platform aims to bring world-class leisure into a modern online ecosystem and showcases Filipino excellence. Bea Alonzo and Andrea Brillantes are the endorsers, representing the brand's dual spirit of heritage and reinvention and targeting a wide range of players and audiences.

articles.title: 41 TikTok-Beloved Products You'll Enjoy Using An Almost Embarrassing Amount
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder for oil absorption and pore blurring. Lottabody launched Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse for hydrated, volumized curls. E.l.f launched Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara for extending thin or fragile lashes. Clinique has almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Black Honey for matching skin tones. Oxo created compact Cold Brew Rapid Brewer to make cheap, delicious cold brew.

articles.title: NRF 2026 APAC Returns to Singapore to Unveil "The Next Now" of Retail Innovation  Nov. 10, 2025 10:00
articles.summary: NRF 2026: Retail's Big Show Asia Pacific will feature the Foodservice Innovation Zone, exploring the fusion of food and retail experiences. It will also include an Innovators Showcase, featuring 42 retail innovations, and the NRF APAC Partner Lounge, connecting retailers with industry partners.

articles.title: Ninja SLUSHi Frozen Drinks Maker Gets Record 36% Price Drop (Aff)
articles.author: The Scotsman
articles.summary: Ninja's Airfryer Max Pro 6.2 L is currently available at a reduced price.

articles.title: I tried the popular item that shoppers say is 'BETTER than Dyson' but 60 per cent cheaper and can't believe the results
articles.author: SARAH FITZMAURICE
articles.summary: Shark has launched the FlexStyle Air Styling & Drying System, a multi-styling hair tool that transforms from a dryer to a wand. It promises curls, volume, and smooth hair without heat damage. The FlexStyle Air is currently on sale for $399, down from $499.

articles.title: Samsung's flagship lineup redefines smartphone intelligence with powerful Galaxy AI and premium design
articles.author: Prakshali Tiwari
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its 2025 flagship smartphone lineup, which includes the Galaxy S25 Ultra, Galaxy Z Fold7, and Galaxy Z Flip7. The Galaxy S25 Ultra features a 200MP camera and Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, while the Galaxy Z Fold7 introduces AI-powered photo and video editing tools. The Galaxy Z Flip7 offers a more functional cover screen and AI-driven personalization features.

articles.title: New World releases sales brochure for its Austin Bohemian in Jordan
articles.author: Hong Kong Standard
articles.summary: New World Development (0017) released a sales brochure.

articles.title: How is JKR using AI?
articles.author: Rob Alderson
articles.summary: JKR is integrating AI tools like Adobe Firefly and ChatGPT for Enterprise into their branding agency. They're piloting these tools to enhance employee efficiency and creative workflows. Furthermore, their work with Coca-Cola and the Adobe Fizzion project to ensure consistency of deployment across the world and multiple partners executing their design system, to provide custom AI style guides.

articles.title: 25 Things From Target Your Home Very Probably Needs
articles.author: Griffin Gonzales
articles.summary: Haden launched retro-style toasters and kettles. Weiman introduced stainless steel wipes. Dyson released a cordless vacuum.

articles.title: StarRez opens Innovation Hub in Hyderabad
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: StarRez launched a global Innovation Hub. This hub represents a new service offering from the company.

articles.title: Dyson Big Ball Vacuum Cleaner Review: Wired But Worth It
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: Dyson has introduced the Big Ball Vacuum Cleaner, priced at Rs 25,900, featuring a 205 AW suction, no-touch bin emptying, and a 360-degree articulation wand. The Big Ball consumes only 250W of power, comes with a five-year warranty, and is a versatile cleaning tool and an efficient alternative to premium cordless units.

articles.title: Samsung campaign for Galaxy phones highlights AI solutions for real-life struggles
articles.author: e4m Staff
articles.summary: Samsung launched its latest flagship devices, the Galaxy S25 Ultra, Galaxy Z Fold7, and Z Flip7, with a campaign by Cheil India highlighting AI-powered solutions for everyday tasks. These devices aim to enhance user experiences and creativity through next-generation intelligence, offering simple and instant solutions to complex situations.

articles.title: Genesys to Strengthen Commitment to Asia with new Full-Service Genesys Cloud Region in Singapore
articles.summary: Genesys has launched a new full-service Genesys Cloud core region in Singapore to help businesses in Asia use their AI-powered platform. The new region, connected to Amazon Web Services, offers advanced AI innovations for real-time experience intelligence and addresses compliance requirements. The Genesys Cloud full-service cloud region in Singapore is expected to be available by the end of November 2025.

articles.title: Amazon expands low-cost ‘Haul' service and launches shopping event as tariffs squeeze Chinese rivals
articles.summary: Amazon launched a new app called Bazaar. Bazaar's product prices are capped at approximately 3,000 forints.

articles.title: Renault Duster to comeback in India in 2026. 4 success factors & 2 challenges
articles.author: Mainak Das
articles.summary: Renault is set to debut the all-new Duster SUV in India in 2026. The new generation Duster will feature a contemporary design, redesigned interior with a touchscreen infotainment system, modern safety features, and turbocharged petrol, hybrid, and mild-hybrid engine options. Renault plans to produce the new Duster locally in India.

articles.title: Xencelabs Launches Ultra-Portable 4K OLED Pen Display 16 Lite​
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Xencelabs has launched the Pen Display 16 Lite, an ultra-portable 4K OLED pen display priced at $899 Euros. The new product features a 4K OLED display, wide color gamut support, and includes two v2 pens and is available through Xencelabs' official stores.

articles.title: Maxitrust MfB, Association Launch MAXI-WASH Loan
articles.author: Leadership News
articles.summary: Maxitrust Microfinance Bank Ltd has launched MAXI-WASH, a new funding package designed to improve health, dignity, and sustainable living in Nigeria by providing access to clean water and sanitation. This product launch, developed in partnership with Water.org and the National Association of Microfinance Banks (NAMB), aims to empower households, schools, markets, and communities by providing access to finance for clean water and sanitation solutions.

articles.title: Nouryon opens new innovation center in Shanghai to accelerate localized innovation and customer collaboration in China
articles.summary: Nouryon has launched an innovation center in Shanghai featuring labs dedicated to products like Expancel®, Kromasil®, Levasil®, and Bermocoll®, alongside a customer experience center.  Nouryon will also open an organic peroxides innovation center in Tianjin in 2026 focused on polymer application for faster product development. The centers aim to support customer growth and enhance innovation capabilities in the Asia-Pacific region.

articles.title: The Human Supply Chain: How mEinstein's Everyday Signals Are Rebuilding Global Intelligence
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: mEinstein proposes a new service leveraging edge intelligence and consented, anonymized data from households to create a faster, fairer, and more resilient supply chain. This involves processing everyday signals on devices and providing aggregated insights to manufacturers and retailers for better demand forecasting and resource allocation. The new approach focuses on transforming everyday signals into a shared asset class that industry can subscribe to without surveillance.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Holiday comedy returns to Portsmouth's Players' Ring
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile has invested billions to improve its network, from big cities to small towns. According to Ookla Speedtest, T-Mobile is recognized as America's best mobile network in the US. T-Mobile supports communities in staying connected.

articles.title: You Probably Haven't Heard Of These 32 Problem-Solving Products Yet — Let's Fix That
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Dae launched Dae's 3-In-1 Styling Cream & Taming Wand. The styling cream helps to smooth down flyaways, and it has a soft built-in brush that users dip in a hydrating blend of dragon fruit, prickly pear seed oil, and meadowfoam seed oil.

articles.title: Nouryon opens new innovation center in Shanghai to accelerate localized innovation and customer collaboration in China
articles.author: Nouryon
articles.summary: Nouryon has opened a new innovation center in Shanghai to boost localized innovation and customer collaboration. This center features specialized labs dedicated to products like Expancel®, Kromasil®, Levasil®, and Bermocoll®, as well as a customer experience center for the Personal Care business. Nouryon also announced plans to open an organic peroxides innovation center in Tianjin in 2026.

articles.title: From air traffic control to skin control: how Richard Mansure's precision mindset created HARP
articles.summary: HARP, created by Richard H. Mansure III, introduced pH-balanced cleansing bars, which are body washes in bar form, formulated without lye and designed to match the skin's natural acidity. The product line expanded to include a retinol series and each bar is manufactured under cGMP standards. The company aims to provide a high-quality cleansing experience mirroring premium face care.

articles.title: 50% Off & 200MP Camera!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: The HONOR Magic7 Pro, originally priced at €1,299, is now available on AliExpress for between €650 and €700. This discounted flagship phone boasts the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, a 6.8-inch AMOLED display, and a 200-megapixel telephoto lens, offering consumers high-end features at a more accessible price point.

articles.title: GBSA connects Pangyo's innovative companies with global media outlets through the 2025 Pangyo Global Media Meet-Up
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Jably presented 'K-tag,' an AI-driven SaaS platform connecting international students with Korean companies, launched in September 2024. Stratio launched the portable spectrometer 'LinkSquare' and the SWIR camera 'BeyonSense'. RnPT Inc. presented 'KRACE,' a healthcare and wellness platform. JL Standard shared its AI-driven 'SoulLink' and 'LifeLink' services for memorial content and digital invitations.

articles.title: a survival strategy for tech giants
articles.summary: Tesla is developing Optimus robots to replace human workers, while Dyson is prototyping robotic solutions after halting electric car plans. Nvidia is partnering with Google and Disney to release a humanoid robot. Figure AI is partnering with BMW to automate factories, and Amazon is deploying robots in warehouses with plans to further automate its workforce.

articles.title: e.l.f. Lands at ULTA Beauty Mexico, Expanding Accessibility to the Best of Beauty for Every Eye, Lip, and Face
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: e.l.f. Beauty has officially launched e.l.f. Cosmetics and e.l.f. SKIN at ULTA Beauty in Mexico on November 10, 2025. The launch includes anticipated products such as Power Grip Primer, Halo Glow Liquid Filter, and Glow Reviver Lip Oil Glimmer, Sheer For It Blush Tint, Holy Hydration! Thirst Burst Drops and Holy Hydration! Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm.

articles.title: Sabah BN launches AI Chatbot to engage young voters
articles.author: Juiceapac Web Development Team
articles.summary: Sabah Barisan Nasional (BN) launched the AI Chatbot BN Sabah to introduce candidates and provide verified information before the Sabah State General Election.  The AI-powered platform aims to engage younger voters and curb misinformation by offering accurate updates on candidates, manifestos, and campaign schedules. The chatbot will be live on Nov 12.

articles.title: StoryPop UGC Agency Announces Innovative UGC Marketing Tools Empowering Brands with Authentic Content Solutions
articles.author: pressadvantage
articles.summary: StoryPop UGC Agency launched a new marketing suite designed to improve brand engagement through user-generated content. The new tools enable brands to collect, curate, and distribute user-generated videos and testimonials efficiently. This helps strengthen their online presence and fosters genuine connections across digital platforms.

articles.title: nubia Air lands in PH for ₱12,999
articles.author: Technobaboy
articles.summary: Nubia is launching the Nubia Air smartphone in the Philippines on November 8. The 8GB+256GB model will retail for ₱12,999. It features a slim design, 6.78-inch AMOLED display, Unisoc T8300 chip, 50MP main camera, and IP68/IP69 rating, and will be available in online stores and authorized retailers.

articles.title: 'The real deal': St. George gets a Scoop of Italy with new gelato shop
articles.author: Jessi Bang
articles.summary: Gigi Gelati has opened a new gelato shop in St. George, offering in-house made gelato with high-quality ingredients. The business was created out of a passion and love for great experience, great hospitality and amazing product.

articles.title: I tried YO! Sushi's new Christmas menu — it was unlike anything I've eaten
articles.author: Ellen Jenne
articles.summary: YO! Sushi is launching a new Christmas menu featuring unconventional items. The menu includes the Xmas Tempura Wrap, a Christmas dinner sushi roll, and The JFC, a Japanese take on KFC. Also the menu includes mince pies transformed into a Japanese cream puff.

articles.title: TDCX recognized as Outstanding Partner at Singapore Airlines' CEO Service &
articles.author: Media Outreach
articles.summary: TDCX developed custom technology solutions for Singapore Airlines, leading to an 80% reduction in handling time for certain transactions. This initiative improved passenger assistance and customer satisfaction. The success of the solution led to its adoption by other vendors and Singapore Airlines, reinforcing TDCX's position as a trusted CX partner.

articles.title: China's high-quality development pursuit shores up confidence of multinationals
articles.author: People Daily
articles.summary: Panasonic introduced a new smart washing machine at the Shanghai import expo. The machine automatically identifies fabrics, analyzes stains, optimizes washing settings and can be controlled via voice. The company envisions this product as part of their smart living concept, with the product being conceived, produced and first launched in China.

articles.title: 32 Low-Lift Home Improvement Items
articles.author: Sally Elshorafa
articles.summary: MaisoNovo introduces stylish refillable bottles for home use, available on Amazon. Additionally, Slobproof offers refillable multi-surface touch-up paint pens for fixing scratches and nicks on walls, doors, and cabinetry, providing a convenient solution for home maintenance.

articles.title: Moomoo Singapore Unveils First Moomoo Stores in Singapore
articles.summary: Moomoo Singapore has unveiled its first Moomoo Stores in Singapore. This launch marks the introduction of a new service by Moomoo Singapore.

articles.title: Media Words appointed to lead Fisherman's Friend media account
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Media Words launched a new marketing campaign for Fisherman's Friend lozenges. The campaign aims to attract a younger audience using influencer content, digital placements, and a refreshed message of "instant freshness" through the tagline "Friends with Benefits".  The national campaign includes digital and out-of-home advertising.

articles.title: World premiere of the all-new Toyota Hilux (Toyota (GB) plc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Toyota revealed the ninth generation of its Hilux pick-up. The new model aligns with Toyota's multipath philosophy, offering multiple powertrain options. The range includes the first battery electric Hilux.

articles.title: StarRez Bets On India's Tech Talent With Global Innovation Hub In Hyderabad
articles.author: BW Online Bureau
articles.summary: StarRez launched a Global Innovation Hub in Hyderabad to advance its technology roadmap, focusing on AI-led innovation, data intelligence, and platform modernization. The Hyderabad team is driving core product engineering, AI innovation, and platform modernization, contributing to enhancing StarRez's platform with predictive tools and data-driven insights.

articles.title: Grab to invest US$60 million in remote driving tech start-up Vay
articles.author: Straits Times
articles.summary: Vay's mobile app enables customers to make requests.

articles.title: As Plant-Based Cleaner Leaf & Mineral™ Expands Across North America, the "Clean Cleaning" Products Market Is Poised for Explosive Growth
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Leaf & Mineral™, a plant-based soap brand, is expanding across North America with its eco-friendly detergents. The company anticipates growth due to increasing consumer demand for sustainable cleaning products. This expansion signals a wider availability and introduction of their product line to new customers.

articles.title: Venus Concept Receives 510(k) for the Venus NOVA, Its Most Advanced Multi-Application Platform for Non-Invasive Body and Skin Treatments (Venus Concept Inc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Venus Concept Inc. has announced that its product, Venus NOVA, has received 510(k) clearance from the U.S. Food and Drug Administration. Venus NOVA is the first product to receive clearance under the company's new R&D strategy.

articles.title: Captain Polyplast Q2 net down 75%, bags new orders
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: The company received an initial order for "Magel Tyala Saur Krishi Pump" during the September quarter. This indicates the product is available or has recently been launched.

articles.title: MADMIA Launches Collection Featuring Socks and Accessories Under $25 AUD
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: MADMIA launched a new collection of socks and accessories priced under $25 AUD. The collection brings style and comfort to people of all ages.

articles.title: Canada's First-Ever Butter Potato Launches Nationwide
articles.author: Canada Newswire
articles.summary: EarthFresh has launched Butter Potatoes in Canada, a new product designed to redefine taste, texture, and versatility within the potato category. This introduction aligns with EarthFresh's commitment to bringing innovation to the fresh produce sector.

articles.title: I'm not sure who asked for a Super Pocket Capcom x Kith fashion collab, but ...
articles.author: Games Radar
articles.summary: Super Pocket is collaborating with fashion brand Kith to release a new Capcom handheld. This new version features a transparent shell and all-over monogramming.
